title: Keeping people alive: malnutrition - the hidden killer
creator_credit: Alan Hart, Ian McFarlane and World Focus
brief_description: Malnutrition kills 15 million young children each year and damages countless more. It slowly erodes physical and mental health. More help is needed from rich nations. From “Five minutes to midnight” (Title code 506172).
